trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The beast can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Primal Bond
entries: Add your Proficiency Bonus to any ability check or saving throw the beast makes.

action.name: Beast's Strike
entries: {@atkr m} {@hitYourSpellAttack Bonus equals your spell attack modifier}, reach 5 ft. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + 2} plus your Wisdom modifier Bludgeoning or Piercing damage (your choice when you summon the beast), and the target has the {@condition Grappled|XPHB} condition (escape DC equals your spell save DC).
